name: Live From The Past (Nick Kornek)
description:
Updates:

- v1.02 - Added an automated message to the main menu if not enough controllers are detected

- v1.01 - Fixed a bug that caused time clones to re-loop their paths or vanish after they killed their own player

____________________________________

Live From The Past is a game of time-travellers battling to create paradoxes and destroy the time continuum.

Shoot your opponent to send them back in time to the start of the duel, then go back and fight them alongside their time echo!

Destroy time echoes to create paradoxes!

2 CONTROLLERS ARE REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME

Created for Wizard Jam X

Designed, Programmed, and Arted by Nick Kornek (@nkornek)

Music by Rind (Instagram, Spotify, YouTube)

Thank you to the Idle Thumbs community for all the wizard jamming fun over the years

Find the secret code in the game to unlock a bonus character!
